# Empirical research foundations

## Phenomenology

Phenomenological philosophy is interested in the general essences or persistent characteristics of things. 

The empirical sciences are sciences of facts, interested in the concrete, singular, contextual and accidental qualities
of phenomena.

https://www.mdpi.com/2076-0760/12/7/413

## Heuristic process principles

-  The principle of evidence: researchers speak of a thing 'only within the limits in which it then presents itself'.

- The principle of ulteriority:  researchers look for the real that remain shadowed or veiled.
